# Server Rules
Welcome to Mario Station the really awesome highly-anticipated fork of Imp Station, read and agree to these rules
These rules are lackluster, but I'm sure you can understand the general idea of them, which is all that really matters to me right now. These rules are in NO PARTICULAR ORDER, rule 5 shouldn't have lower or higher priority than rule 1.
1. No sexual content, themes, or roleplay People ages 16-17 can play this server, so do not partake in sexual content/themes/roleplay at all
2. You should be and act 16+ You should be and act 16 years old or older to play this server, if you are underage, you will be banned until the year after you turn 16
3a. Be respectful Be respectful to other players, and don't take conflicts outside of a round
3b. No discrimination No discrimination in character or out of character
4a. It's roleplay Play a sensible character, don't be too dumb
4b. Only use information your character would know If someone says in LOOC or in a voice chat that they're a thief, your character shouldn't know that
4c. Don't overuse LOOC Using LOOC to talk about some things related to the round might be fine, just don't use it too much and be careful
5. Do your job if possible It'd be annoying if YOU were dying but a doctor was completely ignoring you
